thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 29 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: CME Group Inc To Acquire NEX Group plc

author: Reuters Editorial
title: CME Group Inc To Acquire NEX Group plc

organizations.name: cme group inc to acquire nex group

text:
March 29 (Reuters) - CME Group Inc:
* OFFER FOR NEX GROUP PLC * CME AND NEX HAVE REACHED AGREEMENT ON TERMS OF A RECOMMENDED ACQUISITION WHEREBY ENTIRE ISSUED AND TO BE ISSUED SHARE CAPITAL OF NEX​
* ‍UNDER TERMS OF ACQUISITION, NEX SHAREHOLDERS WILL BE ENTITLED TO RECEIVE: FOR EACH NEX SHARE 500 PENCE IN CASH AND 0.0444 NEW CME SHARES​
* ‍CME BOARD BELIEVES THERE IS A COMPELLING STRATEGIC AND FINANCIAL RATIONALE FOR UNDERTAKING ACQUISITION​
* ‍CME BOARD EXPECTS ACQUISITION TO GENERATE RUN RATE COST SYNERGIES OF $200 MILLION, WHICH ARE ANTICIPATED TO BE FULLY ACHIEVED BY END OF 2021​
* ‍IN ADDITION TO EXPECTED COST SYNERGIES, THERE ARE ANTICIPATED TO BE COMPELLING REVENUE GROWTH​
* ‍NEX’S HEADQUARTERS WILL BE COMBINED WITH CME’S, AND COMBINED COMPANY’S HEADQUARTERS WILL BE LOCATED AT CME’S HEAD OFFICE IN CHICAGO​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
